description.ar: تفعيل إمكانية تخصيص وضع القيادة الرياضية حسب تفضيلاتك الشخصية
description.en: Enable customization of the Sport driving mode to your personal preferences
description.he: הפעלת האפשרות להתאים אישית את מצב הנהיגה הספורטיבי להעדפותיך האישיות

description.ar: إمكانية إغلاق جميع النوافذ عن طريق الضغط المطول على زر القفل في المفتاح
description.en: Ability to close all windows by long-pressing the lock button on the key
description.he: אפשרות לסגור את כל החלונות באמצעות לחיצה ממושכת על כפתור הנעילה במפתח

title.ar: تفعيل فتح صندوق الأمتعة من المفتاح

description.en: Ability to open the trunk by double-pressing the unlock button
description.he: אפשרות לפתוח את תא המטען בלחיצה כפולה على כפתור פתיחת הדלתות

description.ar: إضاءة المصابيح بنمط خاص عند فتح السيارة

description.en: Activate the turn signal to flash 5 times with a single tap.
description.he: הפעלת הבהוב איתות 5 פעמים בלחיצה אחת.

title.ar: رسوم متحركة لشعار M عند بدء التشغيل

description.ar: تغيير رسوم بدء التشغيل على شاشة iDrive إلى شعار M.
description.en: Change the startup animation on the iDrive screen to the M logo.

description.ar: تفعيل نمط عرض M في لوحة العدادات.

description.ar: تعيين وضع القيادة الافتراضي عند بدء تشغيل السيارة.

description.he: הגדר את מצב הנהיגה כברירת מחדל עם התנעת הרכב.

description.ar: تفعيل صوت البوق عند قفل السيارة.
description.en: Activate the horn sound when locking the car.
description.he: הפעלת צליל הצופר בעת נעילת הרכב.

description.ar: عرض ضغط ودرجة حرارة الإطارات في شاشة النظام.
description.en: Display tire pressure and temperature on the system screen.
description.he: הצגת לחץ وטמפרטורת הצמיגים במסך המערכת.

description.he: התאמה אישית או השבתה של התראות iDrive.

description.ar: تفعيل وظائف الراحة عبر نظام الوصول المريح (Comfort Access).
description.en: Activate comfort functions via the Comfort Access system.
description.he: تفعيل وظائف الراحة عبر نظام الوصول المريح (Comfort Access).

description.en: Change the color of the sport displays.
Adjust the maximum volume level.
Change the NBT EVO menu style.

Experience peak braking performance with the 2 Series' innovative Brake Fluid Reset feature.  This isn't just a routine maintenance item; it's a crucial component of ensuring consistent, reliable stopping power.  After a brake fluid change, the Brake Fluid Reset function precisely calibrates the advanced braking system, optimizing its sensitivity and response time. This ensures optimal braking efficiency, shorter stopping distances, and enhanced driver confidence, particularly in demanding driving conditions.  Don't compromise on safety; utilize the Brake Fluid Reset function for a superior and secure driving experience every time.  This seamless integration allows for a quick and easy reset, putting you back on the road with complete confidence in your braking system’s precision and reliability. Properly resetting your brake fluid after a change is essential for maintaining the peak performance and safety features of your BMW 2 Series.

Maintain peak performance and extend the life of your BMW 2 Series engine with our effortless Engine Oil Reset service.  This isn't just about resetting a light; it's about ensuring your sophisticated engine continues to deliver the thrilling driving experience you expect.  After an oil change, simply utilize this intuitive in-car system (or via our connected drive app) to accurately reset your oil service indicator.  No more guesswork, no more missed maintenance intervals – just the precision and peace of mind that comes with owning a BMW. This ensures optimal engine health and protects your valuable investment, keeping your 2 Series performing at its absolute best for miles to come. Avoid potential engine damage and unnecessary repairs by utilizing this critical maintenance function correctly.

Experience precision braking every time with the BMW 2 Series' innovative Front Brake Pads Reset feature.  This isn't just about a simple warning light; it's about proactive maintenance and peak performance.  Our intelligent system monitors pad wear with exceptional accuracy, providing a timely and precise alert when a replacement is due.  Avoid unexpected brake failures and maintain optimal stopping power by staying informed. This sophisticated feature allows you to schedule brake pad replacement conveniently, maximizing the lifespan of your brakes while ensuring your safety and driving enjoyment.  Don't let worn brake pads compromise your driving experience – let the 2 Series' Front Brake Pads Reset keep you in complete control.

Experience precise braking control and optimized performance with the BMW 2 Series' Rear Brake Pad Reset feature.  This isn't just about resetting a light; it's about ensuring your braking system operates at peak efficiency.  After replacing your rear brake pads, this intelligent system recalibrates the brake sensors for accurate wear monitoring and optimal Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) and Dynamic Stability Control (DSC) functionality.  This ensures consistent, reliable braking performance throughout the lifespan of your new pads, maximizing safety and extending the life of your brake system components.  Don't settle for compromised braking – experience the precision and peace of mind that comes with a properly reset system.  This simple yet crucial step, accessible through your vehicle's iDrive system, provides you with the control and confidence you deserve.

Maintain peak performance and keep your BMW 2 Series running smoothly with our intuitive Vehicle Check Reset feature.  This isn't just about clearing a warning light; it's about proactive vehicle health management.  A simple, in-car process allows you to reset service indicators after completing routine maintenance, ensuring your instrument cluster reflects the true state of your vehicle.  No more confusing warning lights or missed service appointments.  Vehicle Check Reset empowers you to stay informed and in control of your 2 Series' well-being, promoting long-term reliability and preserving the joy of driving.

Experience the thrill of the road with the 2 Series' Sport Displays.  These aren't just gauges; they're a dynamic extension of your driving experience.  Crisp, high-resolution graphics deliver vital performance data with breathtaking clarity, transforming your dashboard into a command center.  From a vibrant, customizable tachometer that pulses with the engine's rhythm to a comprehensive display of G-forces and lap times (where applicable), Sport Displays immerse you in the heart of the action.  Intuitive menus allow for easy personalization, letting you select the information most relevant to your driving style.  Forget static displays – with Sport Displays, the 2 Series transforms your daily commute into a spirited drive, providing you with real-time feedback and a visceral connection to the machine under your control.  This isn't just about seeing numbers; it's about feeling the performance.

Experience the ultimate in on-the-go entertainment with the BMW 2 Series' Video in Motion system.  While respecting all applicable local laws and regulations, this innovative feature allows select passengers to enjoy movies, TV shows, and other video content on the central infotainment display while the vehicle is in motion.  This doesn't just mean short clips;  prepare for immersive viewing experiences thanks to the high-resolution screen and seamless integration with your favorite streaming apps. Note:  The driver must always maintain full attention on the road, and the availability of video playback while driving may vary based on vehicle speed and local legal restrictions.  Video in Motion elevates your journeys from simple commutes to engaging adventures, ensuring everyone stays entertained during longer drives.   This feature is designed for passengers' enjoyment and does not compromise safety features.  For the ultimate cinematic experience on the road, choose the BMW 2 Series.

Effortlessly manage your towing needs with the innovative 2 Series Tow Hitch Display.  This isn't just a simple indicator; it's a sophisticated system seamlessly integrated into your infotainment screen.  Get real-time feedback on trailer connection status, ensuring safe and secure hitching every time.  Avoid costly mistakes and potential damage with clear visual cues that confirm proper alignment and prevent accidental disconnections. The Tow Hitch Display provides peace of mind, knowing your trailer is securely attached before you hit the road.  It's more than just convenience; it's intelligent towing assurance designed for the discerning 2 Series driver.

title.ar: رسوم متحركة لشعار M عند بدء التشغيل
أضواء الضباب الأمامية مع الأضواء العالية
title.en: Front Fog Lights w/ High Beams
title.he: פנסי ערפל קדמיים עם אורות גבוהים

title.ar: أضواء الضباب الأمامية مع أضواء الركن
title.en: Front Fog Lights w/ Parking Lights
title.he: פנסי ערפל קדמיים עם אורות חניה

description.en: Dominate the road with unparalleled awareness. The BMW 2 Series' X-View Display isn't just a screen; it's a revolutionary panoramic digital view of your surroundings.  Seamlessly integrated into the dashboard, this high-resolution display provides a comprehensive, bird's-eye perspective, eliminating blind spots and dramatically enhancing your situational awareness.  From effortlessly maneuvering in tight parking spaces to navigating complex intersections with increased confidence, X-View Display transforms your driving experience. Experience a new level of precision and safety – see more, drive smarter, arrive safer.

title.ar: عرض ضغط الإطارات في لوحة القيادة

description.en: Maintain optimal tire pressure effortlessly with the BMW 2 Series' integrated Tire Pressure Display.  This sophisticated system monitors tire pressure in real-time and displays the readings directly on your dashboard.  No more cumbersome manual checks or guesswork – ensuring optimal fuel efficiency, enhanced handling, and significantly improved safety.  The clear, intuitive display provides immediate alerts if pressure is low in any tire, proactively preventing potential blowouts and maximizing your driving experience.  Stay informed, stay in control, and stay safe with this essential feature that seamlessly blends advanced technology with everyday practicality.

title.he: תצוגת קנה מידה של מד מהירות

description.en: Experience exhilarating performance with the 2 Series' meticulously engineered Speedometer Scale Display.  This isn't just a gauge; it's a visceral connection to the road.  The crisp, high-resolution display provides instant, accurate feedback on your speed, allowing for precise control and confident driving.  The intuitive design ensures effortless readability, even at a glance, minimizing distractions and maximizing your focus on the journey.  Feel the surge of power, monitor your speed with unwavering clarity, and experience driving redefined with the 2 Series' dynamic Speedometer Scale Display.  Its precision engineering and elegant presentation seamlessly integrate into the driver-focused cockpit, enhancing both the aesthetic appeal and driving experience.

Elevate your 2 Series driving experience with the Alpina Style Display.  This isn't just a cosmetic upgrade; it's a meticulously crafted digital instrument cluster that seamlessly integrates bespoke Alpina design cues with crucial performance data. Experience the thrill of driving with a vibrant, high-resolution display showcasing a unique Alpina-branded speedometer, tachometer, and intuitive interface.  The crisp graphics and customizable settings deliver a richer, more engaging driving experience, allowing you to monitor key performance metrics with unparalleled clarity. From the subtle Alpina branding to the dynamic animations, every detail has been painstakingly designed to reflect the legendary Alpina heritage and enhance the overall driving pleasure of your 2 Series.  This is more than a display; it's a statement.

Command the road with the redesigned 2 Series Instrument Cluster Logo.  More than just a visual element, this meticulously crafted emblem projects a sense of refined power and bespoke luxury.  The vibrant, high-resolution display ensures crystal-clear visibility of the logo, seamlessly integrated into the driver's digital experience.  Its subtle yet striking presence reinforces the 2 Series' athletic character, serving as a constant reminder of the exhilarating performance waiting to be unleashed.  Experience the thrill of driving with a logo that reflects your individual style and the unwavering quality of BMW engineering.

Experience unparalleled control with the BMW 2 Series' innovative Speed Correction system.  This isn't just cruise control; it's predictive speed assistance.  Utilizing advanced GPS data and real-time speed limit recognition, Speed Correction seamlessly adjusts your vehicle's speed to adhere to posted limits, minimizing the risk of unintentional speeding violations.  Beyond simple adherence, the system anticipates upcoming speed changes, smoothly decelerating or accelerating as necessary for a comfortable and confident driving experience.  No more frantic glances at speedometers – focus on the road ahead while maintaining optimal speed and legal compliance. Speed Correction isn't just a feature; it’s a testament to the 2 Series' commitment to driver assistance and peace of mind.

Experience unparalleled convenience and safety with the 2 Series' innovative Mirror Dip feature.  When reversing, the passenger-side mirror automatically dips downwards, providing an unobstructed view of the curb and eliminating blind spots.  This subtle yet crucial adjustment significantly enhances maneuverability, especially in tight parking spaces or while navigating challenging environments.  No more awkward contortions or guesswork – simply engage reverse and let the intelligent Mirror Dip system take the strain, ensuring confident and precise parking every time.  This feature isn't just a luxury; it's a smart solution designed to bolster your confidence and enhance your driving experience.

Effortlessly enhance your parking experience with the BMW 2 Series' intelligent Mirror Dip Adjustment.  This innovative feature automatically lowers the passenger-side mirror when you engage reverse gear, providing a clear and unobstructed view of the curb and surrounding obstacles.  No more awkward maneuvering or relying on guesswork – simply engage reverse and benefit from significantly improved visibility, making parking in tight spaces a breeze.  This thoughtful addition isn't just convenient; it significantly reduces the risk of costly scrapes and collisions, enhancing both safety and your overall driving confidence.  Experience the seamless integration and precision engineering that defines the BMW driving experience.

title.he: ביטול הגנה אקוסטית על הולכי רגל

title.ar: حساسية أضواء الفرامل في حالات الطوارئ

description.en: Experience unparalleled peace of mind with the BMW 2 Series' enhanced Emergency Braking Lights Sensitivity.  This sophisticated system goes beyond standard hazard lights, employing advanced sensors to detect imminent braking situations, even at lower speeds or in challenging conditions like heavy rain or fog.  When hard braking is detected, the system instantly activates the hazard lights with increased intensity and frequency, significantly improving rearward visibility and alerting following drivers much sooner than conventional systems. This proactive measure dramatically reduces the risk of rear-end collisions, providing an extra layer of safety for you and other road users.  Our engineers have meticulously calibrated the sensitivity to minimize false activations while maximizing effectiveness, ensuring a seamless and reliable experience.  Don't just drive; drive confidently with the 2 Series' superior emergency braking light response.

This isn't just a routine maintenance item; it's a crucial component of ensuring consistent, reliable stopping power.  After a brake fluid change, the Brake Fluid Reset function precisely calibrates the advanced braking system, optimizing its sensitivity and response time. This ensures optimal braking efficiency, shorter stopping distances, and enhanced driver confidence, particularly in demanding driving conditions.  Don't compromise on safety; utilize the Brake Fluid Reset function for a superior and secure driving experience every time.  This seamless integration allows for a quick and easy reset, putting you back on the road with complete confidence in your braking system’s precision and reliability. Properly resetting your brake fluid after a change is essential for maintaining the peak performance and safety features of your BMW 2 Series.

Maintain peak performance and extend the life of your BMW 2 Series engine with our effortless Engine Oil Reset service.  This isn't just about resetting a light; it's about ensuring your sophisticated engine continues to deliver the thrilling driving experience you expect.  After an oil change, simply utilize this intuitive in-car system (or via our connected drive app) to accurately reset your oil service indicator.  No more guesswork, no more missed maintenance intervals – just the precision and peace of mind that comes with owning a BMW. This ensures optimal engine health and protects your valuable investment, keeping your 2 Series performing at its absolute best for miles to come. Avoid potential engine damage and unnecessary repairs by utilizing this critical maintenance function correctly.

Experience precision braking every time with the BMW 2 Series' innovative Front Brake Pads Reset feature.  This isn't just about a simple warning light; it's about proactive maintenance and peak performance.  Our intelligent system monitors pad wear with exceptional accuracy, providing a timely and precise alert when a replacement is due.  Avoid unexpected brake failures and maintain optimal stopping power by staying informed. This sophisticated feature allows you to schedule brake pad replacement conveniently, maximizing the lifespan of your brakes while ensuring your safety and driving enjoyment.  Don't let worn brake pads compromise your driving experience – let the 2 Series' Front Brake Pads Reset keep you in complete control.

Experience precise braking control and optimized performance with the BMW 2 Series' Rear Brake Pad Reset feature.  This isn't just about resetting a light; it's about ensuring your braking system operates at peak efficiency.  After replacing your rear brake pads, this intelligent system recalibrates the brake sensors for accurate wear monitoring and optimal Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) and Dynamic Stability Control (DSC) functionality.  This ensures consistent, reliable braking performance throughout the lifespan of your new pads, maximizing safety and extending the life of your brake system components.  Don't settle for compromised braking – experience the precision and peace of mind that comes with a properly reset system.  This simple yet crucial step, accessible through your vehicle's iDrive system, provides you with the control and confidence you deserve.

Maintain peak performance and keep your BMW 2 Series running smoothly with our intuitive Vehicle Check Reset feature.  This isn't just about clearing a warning light; it's about proactive vehicle health management.  A simple, in-car process allows you to reset service indicators after completing routine maintenance, ensuring your instrument cluster reflects the true state of your vehicle.  No more confusing warning lights or missed service appointments.  Vehicle Check Reset empowers you to stay informed and in control of your 2 Series' well-being, promoting long-term reliability and preserving the joy of driving.

Experience the thrill of the road with the 2 Series' Sport Displays.  These aren't just gauges; they're a dynamic extension of your driving experience.  Crisp, high-resolution graphics deliver vital performance data with breathtaking clarity, transforming your dashboard into a command center.  From a vibrant, customizable tachometer that pulses with the engine's rhythm to a comprehensive display of G-forces and lap times (where applicable), Sport Displays immerse you in the heart of the action.  Intuitive menus allow for easy personalization, letting you select the information most relevant to your driving style.  Forget static displays – with Sport Displays, the 2 Series transforms your daily commute into a spirited drive, providing you with real-time feedback and a visceral connection to the machine under your control.  This isn't just about seeing numbers; it's about feeling the performance.

Experience the ultimate in on-the-go entertainment with the BMW 2 Series' Video in Motion system.  While respecting all applicable local laws and regulations, this innovative feature allows select passengers to enjoy movies, TV shows, and other video content on the central infotainment display while the vehicle is in motion.  This doesn't just mean short clips;  prepare for immersive viewing experiences thanks to the high-resolution screen and seamless integration with your favorite streaming apps. Note:  The driver must always maintain full attention on the road, and the availability of video playback while driving may vary based on vehicle speed and local legal restrictions.  Video in Motion elevates your journeys from simple commutes to engaging adventures, ensuring everyone stays entertained during longer drives.   This feature is designed for passengers' enjoyment and does not compromise safety features.  For the ultimate cinematic experience on the road, choose the BMW 2 Series.

Effortlessly manage your towing needs with the innovative 2 Series Tow Hitch Display.  This isn't just a simple indicator; it's a sophisticated system seamlessly integrated into your infotainment screen.  Get real-time feedback on trailer connection status, ensuring safe and secure hitching every time.  Avoid costly mistakes and potential damage with clear visual cues that confirm proper alignment and prevent accidental disconnections. The Tow Hitch Display provides peace of mind, knowing your trailer is securely attached before you hit the road.  It's more than just convenience; it's intelligent towing assurance designed for the discerning 2 Series driver.

title.he: פנסי ערפל קדמיים עם אורות חניה

description.en: Dominate the road with unparalleled awareness. The BMW 2 Series' X-View Display isn't just a screen; it's a revolutionary panoramic digital view of your surroundings.  Seamlessly integrated into the dashboard, this high-resolution display provides a comprehensive, bird's-eye perspective, eliminating blind spots and dramatically enhancing your situational awareness.  From effortlessly maneuvering in tight parking spaces to navigating complex intersections with increased confidence, X-View Display transforms your driving experience. Experience a new level of precision and safety – see more, drive smarter, arrive safer.

title.ar: عرض ضغط الإطارات في لوحة القيادة

description.en: Maintain optimal tire pressure effortlessly with the BMW 2 Series' integrated Tire Pressure Display.  This sophisticated system monitors tire pressure in real-time and displays the readings directly on your dashboard.  No more cumbersome manual checks or guesswork – ensuring optimal fuel efficiency, enhanced handling, and significantly improved safety.  The clear, intuitive display provides immediate alerts if pressure is low in any tire, proactively preventing potential blowouts and maximizing your driving experience.  Stay informed, stay in control, and stay safe with this essential feature that seamlessly blends advanced technology with everyday practicality.

title.he: תצוגת קנה מידה של מד מהירות

description.en: Experience exhilarating performance with the 2 Series' meticulously engineered Speedometer Scale Display.  This isn't just a gauge; it's a visceral connection to the road.  The crisp, high-resolution display provides instant, accurate feedback on your speed, allowing for precise control and confident driving.  The intuitive design ensures effortless readability, even at a glance, minimizing distractions and maximizing your focus on the journey.  Feel the surge of power, monitor your speed with unwavering clarity, and experience driving redefined with the 2 Series' dynamic Speedometer Scale Display.  Its precision engineering and elegant presentation seamlessly integrate into the driver-focused cockpit, enhancing both the aesthetic appeal and driving experience.

Elevate your 2 Series driving experience with the Alpina Style Display.  This isn't just a cosmetic upgrade; it's a meticulously crafted digital instrument cluster that seamlessly integrates bespoke Alpina design cues with crucial performance data. Experience the thrill of driving with a vibrant, high-resolution display showcasing a unique Alpina-branded speedometer, tachometer, and intuitive interface.  The crisp graphics and customizable settings deliver a richer, more engaging driving experience, allowing you to monitor key performance metrics with unparalleled clarity. From the subtle Alpina branding to the dynamic animations, every detail has been painstakingly designed to reflect the legendary Alpina heritage and enhance the overall driving pleasure of your 2 Series.  This is more than a display; it's a statement.

Command the road with the redesigned 2 Series Instrument Cluster Logo.  More than just a visual element, this meticulously crafted emblem projects a sense of refined power and bespoke luxury.  The vibrant, high-resolution display ensures crystal-clear visibility of the logo, seamlessly integrated into the driver's digital experience.  Its subtle yet striking presence reinforces the 2 Series' athletic character, serving as a constant reminder of the exhilarating performance waiting to be unleashed.  Experience the thrill of driving with a logo that reflects your individual style and the unwavering quality of BMW engineering.

Experience unparalleled control with the BMW 2 Series' innovative Speed Correction system.  This isn't just cruise control; it's predictive speed assistance.  Utilizing advanced GPS data and real-time speed limit recognition, Speed Correction seamlessly adjusts your vehicle's speed to adhere to posted limits, minimizing the risk of unintentional speeding violations.  Beyond simple adherence, the system anticipates upcoming speed changes, smoothly decelerating or accelerating as necessary for a comfortable and confident driving experience.  No more frantic glances at speedometers – focus on the road ahead while maintaining optimal speed and legal compliance. Speed Correction isn't just a feature; it’s a testament to the 2 Series' commitment to driver assistance and peace of mind.

Experience unparalleled convenience and safety with the 2 Series' innovative Mirror Dip feature.  When reversing, the passenger-side mirror automatically dips downwards, providing an unobstructed view of the curb and eliminating blind spots.  This subtle yet crucial adjustment significantly enhances maneuverability, especially in tight parking spaces or while navigating challenging environments.  No more awkward contortions or guesswork – simply engage reverse and let the intelligent Mirror Dip system take the strain, ensuring confident and precise parking every time.  This feature isn't just a luxury; it's a smart solution designed to bolster your confidence and enhance your driving experience.

Effortlessly enhance your parking experience with the BMW 2 Series' intelligent Mirror Dip Adjustment.  This innovative feature automatically lowers the passenger-side mirror when you engage reverse gear, providing a clear and unobstructed view of the curb and surrounding obstacles.  No more awkward maneuvering or relying on guesswork – simply engage reverse and benefit from significantly improved visibility, making parking in tight spaces a breeze.  This thoughtful addition isn't just convenient; it significantly reduces the risk of costly scrapes and collisions, enhancing both safety and your overall driving confidence.  Experience the seamless integration and precision engineering that defines the BMW driving experience.

title.he: ביטול הגנה אקוסטית על הולכי רגל

title.ar: حساسية أضواء الفرامل في حالات الطوارئ

description.en: Experience unparalleled peace of mind with the BMW 2 Series' enhanced Emergency Braking Lights Sensitivity.  This sophisticated system goes beyond standard hazard lights, employing advanced sensors to detect imminent braking situations, even at lower speeds or in challenging conditions like heavy rain or fog.  When hard braking is detected, the system instantly activates the hazard lights with increased intensity and frequency, significantly improving rearward visibility and alerting following drivers much sooner than conventional systems. This proactive measure dramatically reduces the risk of rear-end collisions, providing an extra layer of safety for you and other road users.  Our engineers have meticulously calibrated the sensitivity to minimize false activations while maximizing effectiveness, ensuring a seamless and reliable experience.  Don't just drive; drive confidently with the 2 Series' superior emergency braking light response.
